error.offline: The backend is currently offline! Please contact support@midata.coop if the problem persists.
error.internal: An internal error occured. Please contact support@midata.coop if the problem persists.
error.internal_db: An internal database error occured. Please contact support@midata.coop if the problem persists.
error.noconsent: No active consent that allows to add data for target person.
error.notrialuser_detail: In order to use this feature you need to complete your registration. Request a written copy of the AGB and return it signed. You will also receive a confirmation code to verify your postal address. If you want to check your account status click on your username on the top right and check the 'Account Status' section.
error.mustbemember_detail: In order to use this feature you must be member of the MIDATA cooperative. Click on your username on the top right and check the 'Account Status' section for more information.

notauthorized.action: You are not authorized to do this action
notauthorized.fields: You are not authorized to query the provided fields
notauthorized.account: You are not authorized to access this account
notauthorized.study: You are not authorized to access this study

invalid.email: Please enter a valid email address
invalid.credentials_hint: Invalid email address or password. You are trying to log in as account holder. Are you
invalid.password_repetition: Password and password repetition do not match!
invalid.passphrase_repetition: Passphrase and passphrase repetition do not match!
invalid.day: Enter a valid day of month (1 - 31)
invalid.string: Field must be of type string
invalid.plugin: Plugin is intended for a different role
invalid.access_query: The Data Access Filter must restrict by 'content' or 'group'!
invalid.sharing: The Data Access Filter contains data types that are excluded by the study configuration.
invalid.anonymous: Study can only be anonymous if no one is allowed to access unpseudonymized data.

missing.credentials: Please provide your email address and password.
missing.email: Please fill out your email address.
missing.input_field: Please fill out this input field.
missing.study_group: Participant must first be assigned to a group.

unknown.space: The requested space does no longer exist.
unknown.content: Record Content-Type is not registered with the platform.

exists.user: A person with this email is already registered.
exists.member: A person with this email is already registered.
exists.provider: A healthcare provider with this name already exists.
exists.research: A research organisation with this name already exists.
exists.plugin: A plugin with the same name already exists.
exists.study: A study with this name already exists.

blocked.user: User is not allowed to log in. Contact support@midata.coop for help.
blocked.password1: Too many bad login attempts. Wait 1 minute before next attempt.
blocked.password5: Too many bad login attempts. Wait 5 minutes before next attempt.
blocked.password60: Too many bad login attempts. Wait 1 hour before next attempt.
blocked.participation: Account holder is not allowed to participate in study.
blocked.consent: The consent for using this app has been revoked. To reenable the app, delete the rejected or expired consent on the MIDATA portal.
blocked.app: You are allowed to use this app on a maximum of 10 devices. Please delete unused consents on the MIDATA portal.

tooshort.password: Passwords must be at least 8 characters long.
tooshort.passphrase: Passphrases must be at least 8 characters long.

tooweak.password: Passwords should contain upper/lower case letters, numbers and special characters.
tooweak.passphrase: Passphrases should contain upper/lower case letters, numbers and special characters.

expired.token: This activation token has already expired. Please request a new one.
expired.tokenresent: This activation token has already expired. A new token has been sent to your email address right now. Please confirm your email address within 24 hours using the new token.

no_alter.consent: Consents for studies may not be altered.
no_alter.study: Setup can only be changed as long as study is in draft phase.
no_alter.group: Group of participant can only be changed if study is not running or no participant accepted yet.

eventtype.user-account-change-by-admin: User account changed by an administrator
eventtype.study-participation-member-retreat: Account holder retreated from study participation

userfeature.EMAIL_ENTERED: Email address of user must be known to the platform
userfeature.EMAIL_VERIFIED: Email address of user must have been verified
userfeature.PHONE_ENTERED: Mobile phone number of user must be known to the platform
userfeature.PHONE_VERIFIED: Mobile phone number of user must have been verified
userfeature.ADDRESS_ENTERED: Post address of user must be known to the platform
userfeature.ADDRESS_VERIFIED: Post address of user must have been verified
userfeature.PASSPORT_VERIFIED: ID card of users must have been verified
userfeature.MIDATA_COOPERATIVE_MEMBER: User must be member of the cooperative
userfeature.ADMIN_VERIFIED: Account must have been unlocked by a MIDATA administrator

writepermissiontype.UPDATE_AND_CREATE: Data covered by consent may be written or updated.
writepermissiontype.WRITE_ANY: Any kind of data may be written using this consent.

instance.data: Data stored in this MIDATA instance
instance.start: Choose one of the portal from the top of the page to start. Each portal has its own LOGIN and SIGN UP page.

localhost.name: Local Instance (localhost)
localhost.intro: This is a local installation of the MIDATA platform, only available from your PC.
localhost.purpose: A local installation may be used in order to contribute to the MIDATA platform and for testing purposes.
localhost.access: You may register user accounts for all four portals. Accounts do not need to be validated by a MIDATA administrator. You may register and use your own admin accounts.
localhost.uptime: Whenever you run it, its available only for you :-)
localhost.data: Data stored in this instance will only be available on your local PC.

test.name: Test Instance (test.midata.coop)
test.intro: This is a test instance of the MIDATA platform.
test.purpose: This instance may be used to develop and test new apps and plugins for MIDATA in a safe environment. It is also used to test new versions of the portal and the backend before the other instances are updated.
test.access: Register your own developer account. After validation by a MIDATA administrator, you may register test users, researchers and health providers without additional validation.
test.uptime: There is no guarantee on availability. Expect updates of the instance to happen as needed. If possible, updates are done between 12:00 and 13:00 central european time, but may occur more than once a day if problems occur.
test.data: Store only test data on this instance. Data may be wiped, accounts may be deleted if necessary. Records may become corrupted by bugs. There is no backup of the data.

demo.name: Demo Instance (demo.midata.coop)
demo.intro: This is a demonstration instance of the MIDATA platform.
demo.purpose: This instance may be used for demonstration purposes and training.
demo.access: You may register user accounts for all four portals. Accounts must be validated by a MIDATA administrator, before they are unlocked.
demo.uptime: This instance is updated less frequently than the test.midata.coop instance. Expected downtime is once a week on Monday between 12:00 and 14:00 central european time.
demo.data: Store only demonstration data on this instance. There is no backup of the data.

ch.name: MIDATA Switzerland (ch.midata.coop)
ch.intro: This is the MIDATA platform for Switzerland.
ch.purpose: This is the productive MIDATA platform for storing health data in Switzerland.
ch.access: New user accounts have feature restrictions. Healthprovider, research and development accounts can only be used after validation by MIDATA. Fake or test accounts are not allowed and will be blocked.
ch.data: This instance is for storing real data about real people. Data is backed up on a daily basis.

registration.mandantory_fields: Please fill in the required information below (fields marked with an asterisk * are mandatory)
registration.agb4: I agree to MIDATA's terms of use
registration.privacypolicy4: I agree to MIDATA's privacy terms
registration.app_agb4: I agree to the App Terms and Conditions

lostpw.title: Password Assistance - Step 1
lostpw.description: Enter the email address associated with your account, then click Continue. We'll email you a link to a page where you can easily create a new password.
lostpw.success: We have sent you an email with instructions on how to reset your password.

setpw.title: Password Assistance - Step 2
setpw.enter_new: Please enter a new password for your account.
setpw.success: You have successfully set a new password for your account.

passphrase.title: Enter Passphrase
passphrase.description: Your account is protected with a passphrase.
passphrase.if_lost: If you lost your passphrase contact support@midata.coop

postregister.title: Welcome to MIDATA
postregister.email_instructions: Your email address needs to be confirmed. An activation email has been sent to your account. Just click on the link in this email to confirm your email address.
postregister.email_code: For convenience you may enter the code from the email here:
postregister.contract_instructions: A contract has been sent to your postal address. Please return it signed to MIDATA.
postregister.pilot_phase: A MIDATA administrator will verify and unlock your account. You will be notified when your account has been unlocked.
postregister.code_intructions: A letter with a confirmation code will be sent to your postal address. Enter this confirmation code to access the platform.
postregister.code_done: You have provided the confirmation code. You may login after the signed contract has arrived at MIDATA.
postregister.address_entered: Your postal address is required to use this service, please provide it.
postregister.phone_entered: A mobile phone number is required to use this service, please provide it.
postregister.admin_verified: Your account must be unlocked by a MIDATA administrator. Please retry later. If your account has not been unlocked for more than 24 hours, please contact MIDATA.

changepassphrase.title: Change Passphrase
changepassphrase.description: A passphrase is an additional protection (additional encryption) for your data. It is not stored on our servers. You have to provide the passphrase on every login, to make it possible to decrypt your data. If you loose your passphrase, you will not be able to access your data anymore!.
changepassphrase.if_unprotected: If your account is not yet protected by a passphrase leave the field 'Old passphrase' empty.
changepassphrase.keep_passphrase_safe: Please keep your passphrase at a save place, there is no recovery function for it. If you loose your passphrase, you will not be able to access your data anymore!.
changepassphrase.repeat_finalizes: By repeating your new passphrase you make the change final.

market.no_spotlighted_plugins: There are no spotlighted plugins yet.
market.no_recommendations: We have no recommendations for you yet.

newconsent.share_with_provider: I want to share data with a health professional.
newconsent.use_passcode2: I do not know yet to whom I want to share the data. Please add a passcode to this consent that I can give to a health professional.
newconsent.which_persons: With which persons(s) is data shared?
newconsent.set_owner_btn: Select person that shares its data
newconsent.writes2: The persons authorized by this consent may create or update data in your account covered by this consent.
newconsent.reshare2: The persons authorized by this consent may reshare the data I gave them access to.
newconsent.created_before: Do not share data created after:
newconsent.share_what: What data do you want to share?
newconsent.consent_empty: This consent is empty at the beginning. You can select the data you want to share with this consent afterwards.

editconsent.title: Consent
editconsent.name: Name of Consent
editconsent.people: With which persons(s) do you want to share data?
editconsent.created_before: Does not share data created after:
editconsent.consent_empty: This consent does not share any data at the moment.
editconsent.type_circle: This consent shares data with other MIDATA account holders.
editconsent.type_healthcare: This consent shares data with healthcare professionals.
editconsent.type_studyparticipation: This consent shares data with research for use in a study.
editconsent.type_studyrelated: This consent shares research data to a study participant.
editconsent.type_externalservice: This consent shares data with a mobile app or external service.
editconsent.type_implicit: This implicitely created consent shares messages with their receivers.
editconsent.status_expired: This consent is expired. Data is no longer shared.
editconsent.status_unconfirmed: This consent needs confirmation by its owner.

editconsent.excludes_group: Excluded are records belonging to group: {{ group }}

consents.title: Consents
consents.description: Using consents you can grant others (healthcare professionals, friends, researchers, ...) access to some of your data. Use this page to manage your consents and create new ones.
consents.where_owner: Show consents where you share data with someone else
consents.where_authorized: Show consents where data is shared with you
consents.name: Consent Title

revconsents.count: There are {{ count }} consent(s) sharing data with you:

records.title: My Data
records.share_instructions1: Please use the 'share' and 'unshare' buttons to select which records you want to share with consent
records.share_instructions2: This consent currently shares data with
records.delete_instructions5: on the 'delete' button to the right of the record.
records.delete_instructions6: In order to permanently delete all records of a certain category, double click on the 'delete all' button to the right of the category.
records.too_many_consents: The record tree for this selection cannot be created. There are too many consents involved.

oauth2.requests_permission: requests the permission to access your personal data.
oauth2.reshares_data: App may share data it has access to to third parties.
oauth2.allows_user_search: Your name and email address may be searched by other people using this app.
oauth2.please_confirm: Please confirm the activation of the application using the MIDATA portal, then retry. Consent title is: {{ consent }}

dashboard.mydata_text: Manage your health data. Enter new data and visualize existing data.
dashboard.social_text: Share your data with friends. Communicate with people sharing your health situation. Motivate yourself by competition with others.
dashboard.research_text: Participate in studies. Inform yourself about current research.
dashboard.health_text: Share data with your doctor. Search for health professionals.
dashboard.newrecords_teaser: There are no new records. Visit the records page to browser all of your records.
dashboard.newsharedrecords_teaser: Other MIDATA account holders may share their data with you.
dashboard.circles_teaser: Ask others to add you to their circles.
dashboard.circles2_teaser: Create Circles to share your data with others. Share with friends, family or others.
dashboard.providers_teaser: Search for healthcare providers and add them to your list in order to share data with them.
dashboard.hcrecords: Newest records from your healthcare providers
dashboard.studies_teaser: If you want to participate in research, configure your research settings. You will be contacted in this tile if you match a studies requirements.
dashboard.researchnews_text: Search for new health research publications.

addtask.survey_description: Please fill out the surveys I shared with your account.
